Dame Agatha Mary Clarissa Christie, Lady Mallowan, DBE (née Miller);  15 Septemba 1890 – 12 Jenụwarị 1976) bụ onye odee Bekee mara maka akwụkwọ akụkọ nchọpụta 66 ya na mkpokọta mkpirisi akụkọ iri na anọ, ọkachasị ndị na-atụgharị n'akụkụ ndị nchọpụta akụkọ ifo Hercule Poirot na Miss Marple
O dekwara egwu egwu kachasị ogologo n'ụwa, ihe omimi igbu ọchụ The Mousetrap, nke a na-eme na West End kemgbe 1952
Onye edemede n'oge "Golden Age of Detective Fiction", a na-akpọ Christie "Queen of Crime"
O dekwara akwụkwọ akụkọ isii n'okpuru pseudonym Mary Westmacott
Na 1971, Queen Elizabeth II mere ya Dame (DBE) maka ntinye aka ya na akwụkwọ
Guinness World Records depụtara Christie dị ka onye ode akwụkwọ akụkọ ifo kacha ere n'oge niile, akwụkwọ akụkọ ya rerela ihe karịrị ijeri abụọ.￼
